item.title: Version 133
item.description:
326 / 5.000 In this version of Astro:
Added the ability to track the ratings of your apps. Added an option to pause the keyword update for an app. Added the ability to change the store language in the ranking view. In this version of Astro:
Added the ability to track the ratings of your apps. Added an option to pause the keyword update for an app. Added the ability to change the store language in the ranking view. Added the count of apps in the "Apps in ranking" column.
